ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Had it not been that he was a man who glorified Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Had he not been one of those who struggled hard,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Had he not been one of those who glorify Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And were he not one of those who praise. –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Had he not been of them who glorify Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But had it not been that he was of those who glorify (Us),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Now had he not been of those that glorify God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And had he not been one of those who glorify (Allah)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Had he not been one of those who acknowledge the glory of God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And had he not been of those who hallow Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Had he not been one of those who celebrate Allah’s glory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Had it not been that he (repented and) glorified Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Had he not been of them who glorify Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and had he not been among those who exalt (Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Had he not been one of those who praised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:143] And had he not been one of those who glorify [God], that is to say, those who make remembrance [of God], for inside the whale’s belly he was repeatedly saying [the words] ‘There is no god except You. Glory be to You! I have indeed been one of the wrongdoers’ [Q. 21:87],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And had he not been one of those who glorify (Allah)) had he not been of those who prayed before that
